titles.title: Designating the week of November 6, 1994 through November 12, 1994, "National Health Information Management Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 9/30/1994--Introduced. Designates the week of November 6 through 12, 1994, as National Health Information Management Week.
